name: BitLucid Agency
tagline: The BitLucid Agency's Open Source Projects
body:
### BitLucid on github.

This is our listing of current ongoing projects and past projects hosted in these repositories.

In a sentence, we code strong and stable php websites from server to database to visuals...

Our main site is at [bitlucid.com](bitlucid.com)

One major repository that we work on frequently in our downtime is the code repository for [ninjawars.net](ninjawars.net) :

https://github.com/BitLucid/ninjawars

Various of the other repositories are sites or code tools that we use or work on.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
